meta.expressionLhs: CASE WHEN MONTH ( "EKKO"."AEDAT" ) >= 10 THEN YEAR ( "EKKO"."AEDAT" ) || '-' || MONTH ( "EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ELSE YEAR ( "EKKO"."AEDAT" ) || '-0' || MONTH ( "EKKO"."AEDAT" ) END AS "#{\"EKKO\".\"AEDAT\"}" FORMAT "%Y-%m"

axis0.name: <%= ButtonDrilldown3_text%>
axis0.translatedName: <%=  ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."MATKL" || \' - \' || "EKPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'  ? 'Material Group':    ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."BUKRS" || \' - \' || "EKPO"."BUKRS_TEXT"'  ? 'Company Code':    ButtonDrilldown3 == '"LFA1"."LIFNR" || \' - \' || "LFA1"."NAME1"'  ? 'Vendor':   ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."MATNR" || \' - \' || "EKPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'  ? 'Material':   ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKKO"."EKORG" || \' - \' || "EKKO"."EKORG_TEXT"'  ? 'Purch. Organization':   ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKKO"."BSART" || \' - \' || "EKKO"."BSART_TEXT"'  ? 'Purchasing Doc. Type': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."MANDT"'  ? 'Client':   ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."EBELN"'  ? 'Purchasing Document':   ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."EBELP"'  ? 'Item Number':   ButtonDrilldown3 == 'CASE WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") >= 0 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 100 THEN \'a) 0 - 100€\' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 100 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 500 THEN \'b) 100 - 500€\' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 500 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 1000 THEN \'c) 500 - 1.000€\' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 1000 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 10000 THEN \'d) 1.000 - 10.000€\' ELSE \'e) > 10.000€\' END'  ? 'Purchase Order Amount':   ''%>

variables.title: ButtonDrilldown3
variables.variableValue: CASE WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") >= 0 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 100 THEN 'a) 0 - 100€' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 100 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 500 THEN 'b) 100 - 500€' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 500 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 1000 THEN 'c) 500 - 1.000€' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 1000 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 10000 THEN 'd) 1.000 - 10.000€' ELSE 'e) > 10.000€' END

components.message:
General Information

#{This Sheet provides a general overview about the most important KPIs and its development over time. }

KPI Definition

#{Total Cycle Time in Days: }
#{Time between Process Start and Process End in Days.}

#{Subprocess Cycle Time in Days: }
#{Time between two activities in Days. From which activity the calculated Cycle Time should start and at which it should end can be configured through range specifiers.}

#{Automation Rate: }
#{Share of Activities completed automatically (by a batch system user).}

#{Undesired Activity Rate: }
#{Share of Purchase Order Items, in which at least one Undesired Activity (user defined) has happened.}

#{Repeated Activity Rate: }
#{Share of Purchase Order Items in which Activities (user defined) have happened more than once.}

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (10,11,12) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || ' - Q1'
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (1,2,3) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || ' - Q2'
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (4,5,6) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) || ' - Q3'
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") IN (7,8,9) THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || ' - Q4'
ELSE NULL
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") ||'-' || MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT")
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") ||'-0' || MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT")
--- ADD one Year if we are already in CW 1 at the end of December
+ CASE WHEN MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT") = 12 AND CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT") = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
|| '-CW-' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT")
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT") || '-CW-0' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("EKKO"."AEDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH( "EKKO"."AEDAT" ) >= 10
THEN CASE
WHEN DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
END
ELSE CASE
WHEN DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("EKKO"."AEDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("EKKO"."AEDAT" )
END
END

variables.name: filter6
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

variables.name: filter7
variables.value:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("EKPO"."LOEKZ") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'S' THEN 'locked'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'L' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "EKPO"."LOEKZ"
END
